content: bring a touch of disney magic into your crochet projects with the **easy mickey mouse granny square** this playful design combines the charm of the classic granny square with mickey s iconic ears making it a fun and unique block for blankets cushions bags or kids room décor the pattern is beginner-friendly written in plain english no abbreviations and comes with step-by-step video tutorials for both left- and right-handed crocheters quick to make and endlessly customizable these squares are perfect for gifts stash-busting or simply adding a little disney-inspired joy to your handmade creations ✔️ beginner-friendly no abbreviations clear step-by-step instructions ✔️ video tutorials included left- and right-handed versions ✔️ quick to work up finish in one sitting ✔️ versatile use as blocks appliqués or motifs ✔️ fun for all ages perfect for disney fans ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/4mgpin3 ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/3vxmcdh ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/hp9roaeipku ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/hbdx-ekxhbi
